languages.text: "Попробуй оскорбить меня еще один раз, мон-кай — и я на деле покажу тебе, какой мразью могу быть, когда зол. После такого эта маленькая забава..." {n}Маражай со скрежетом проводит когтем перчатки по устройству-саркофагу.{/n} "...покажется тебе источником величайшего наслаждения".

"Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
languages.original_text: "Попробуй оскорбить меня еще один раз, мон-кай — и я на деле покажу тебе, какой мразью могу быть, когда зол. После такого эта маленькая забава..." {n}Маражай со скрежетом проводит когтем перчатки по устройству-саркофагу.{/n} "...покажется тебе источником величайшего наслаждения".

traits.locale_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and I will show you how much of a filth I can be when I am angry. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and I will show you how much of a filth I can be when I am angry. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and I will show you the filth I can be when I am livid. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and I will show you the filth I can be when I am livid. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「もう一度俺を侮辱して見ろ、モン＝ケイ。彼が怒ったらどんな恐ろしいことになるか見せてやる。それに比べれば…」{n}マラズハイはガントレットの爪で棺のような装置をひっかく。{/n}「…このささやかな気晴らしも楽しいものに思えるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."

traits.locale_text: 「もう一度俺を侮辱して見ろ、モン＝ケイ。彼が怒ったらどんな恐ろしいことになるか見せてやる。それに比べれば…」{n}マラズハイはガントレットの爪で棺のような装置をひっかく。{/n}「…このささやかな気晴らしも楽しいものに思えるだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “如果你再敢侮辱我，猴子，这个卑劣的玩意儿就要让你看看什么叫做真正的怒火。至于这个小小的消遣……”{n}玛拉斋用他带着尖爪的手套刮着身边棺柩一样的装置。{/n}“……相比之下甚至会令人愉悦。”
languages.original_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."

traits.locale_text: “如果你再敢侮辱我，猴子，我就要让你看看我生气的时候有多么可怕。至于这个小小的消遣……”{n}玛拉斋用他带着尖爪的手套刮着身边棺柩一样的装置。{/n}“……相比之下甚至会令人愉悦。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Insúltame de nuevo, mon-keigh, y te mostraré de qué es capaz esta alimaña cuando se enfurece. Esta pequeña diversión...». {n}Marazhai raspa el sarcófago con una garra de su guantelete.{/n} «... parecerá placentera en comparación».
languages.original_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."

traits.locale_text: «Insúltame de nuevo, mon-keigh, y te mostraré qué clase de alimaña puedo ser cuando me enfurezco. Esta pequeña diversión...». {n}Marazhai raspa el sarcófago con una garra de su guantelete.{/n} «... parecerá placentera en comparación».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Beleidigt mich erneut, Chem-Pan-Sey, und dieser Abschaum wird Euch zeigt, wie es ist, wenn er in Wut gerät. Diese kleine Ablenkung ..." {n}Marazhai kratzt mit einer Klaue seines Handschuhs über die sarcophagus-ähnliche Apparatur,{/n} "wird Euch im Vergleich dazu ganz entzückend vorkommen."
languages.original_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich noch einmal beleidigt, Chem-Pan-Sey, dann zeige ich Euch, was ich im wütenden Zustand für ein Abschaum sein kann. Diese kleine Ablenkung"{n}, Marazhai kratzt mit einer Klaue seines Handschuhs über die sarcophagus-ähnliche Apparatur,{/n} "wird Euch im Vergleich dazu ganz entzückend vorkommen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Insultez-moi encore une fois, mon-keigh, et vous subirez toute l'étendue de ma colère, {n}rétorque Marazhai en effleurant le sarcophage avec une griffe de son gant.{/n} Croyez-moi si je vous dis que vous en viendriez à regretter cette petite distraction. »
languages.original_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."

traits.locale_text: « Insultez-moi encore une fois, mon-keigh, et vous subirez toute l'étendue de ma colère, » {n}rétorque Marazhai en effleurant le sarcophage avec une griffe de son gant.{/n} Croyez-moi si je vous dis que vous en viendriez à regretter cette petite distraction. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sıkıysa hakaretini tekrar duyalım mon-keigh. Bakalım kızınca hangimizin leşi ortaya serilecek? Sana yapacaklarıma kıyasla bu cihaz..." {n}Marazhai, eldiveninin pençelerinden biriyle lahdi andıran cihaza çizik atıyor.{/n} "...Aklında eğlenceli bir anı olarak yer edinir."
languages.original_text: "Insult me again, mon-keigh, and this filth will show you what he is like in anger. This little diversion..." {n}Marazhai scrapes the sarcophagus-like device with a claw of his gauntlet.{/n} "...will seem delightful in comparison."

traits.locale_text: "Sıkıysa tekrar bana hakaret et bakalım mon-keigh; bakalım kızınca hangimizin leşi ortaya serilecek? Sana yapacaklarıma kıyasla, bu cihaz..." {n}Marazhai, eldiveninin pençelerinden biriyle lahidi andıran cihaza çizik atıyor.{/n} "... Aklında eğlenceli bir anı olarak yer edinecek."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
